desc: Mimi's Art Gallery and Studio. Featuring the work of Mimi Schlichter, fine art oil painter. Gallery original paintings and commissions. Painting on Cape Cod for nearly 30 years. Paintings to calm your mind, soothe your soul, and inspire joy. Blog #artistsreallife - real life adventures of art and faith

layout.text: Paintings to soothe your soul, calm your mind, inspire joy.
Celebrating Cape Cod as home for nearly 25 years.
